summary.para: The Get method gets the current setting of a camera property.

param.name: Property
param.para: Specifies the property to retrieve, as a value from the enumeration.

param.name: lValue
param.para: Receives the value of the property.

param.name: Flags
param.para: Receives a member of the enumeration. The returned value indicates whether the setting is controlled manually or automatically.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The GetRange method gets the range and default value of a specified camera property.

param.name: Property
param.para: Specifies the property to query, as a value from the enumeration.

param.name: pMin
param.para: Receives the minimum value of the property.

param.name: pMax
param.para: Receives the maximum value of the property.

param.name: pSteppingDelta
param.para: Receives the step size for the property. The step size is the smallest increment by which the property can change.

param.name: pDefault
param.para: Receives the default value of the property.

param.name: pCapsFlags
param.para: Receives a member of the enumeration, indicating whether the property is controlled automatically or manually.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The Set method sets a specified property on the camera.

param.name: Property
param.para: Specifies the property to set, as a value from the enumeration.

param.name: lValue
param.para: Specifies the new value of the property.

param.name: Flags
param.para: Specifies the desired control setting, as a member of the enumeration.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: If the Flags parameter is CameraControl_Flags_Auto, the method ignores the lValue parameter.

summary.para: The IAMCameraControl interface controls camera settings such as zoom, pan, aperture adjustment, or shutter speed. To obtain this interface, query the filter that controls the camera.

remarks.para: For Windows Driver Model (WDM) devices, the WDM Video Capture Filter automatically exposes this interface if the WDM driver supports the PROPSETID_VIDCAP_CAMERACONTROL property set. For more information, see the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) documentation.
